intro: Kalonymus miniata, commonly known as the red-stemmed spurge, is a perennial herbaceous plant native to tropical regions of Africa. It features erect, slender stems that are typically reddish in color, especially when mature. The plant produces small, greenish-yellow flowers that are clustered in dense inflorescences, often with a slight reddish tinge. Its leaves are alternate, ovate, and have a slightly hairy texture. Kalonymus miniata is often found in disturbed soils and can thrive in full sun to partial shade conditions.
